means: 达摩克利斯，为叙拉古(Syracuse)暴君Dionysius的宠信

sentence.Network_en: As a Grand Prix driver, you have the Sword of Damocles hanging over your head at every moment.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为国际汽车大奖赛的车手，随时都有可能发生事故。

sentence.Network_en: The college entrance examination is like a sword of Damocles.
sentence.Network_cn: 高考就像是一把达摩克里斯的利剑高悬的这些学生头上.

sentence.Network_en: Unemployment, like the sword of Damocles, was always accompanying the workers.
sentence.Network_cn: 失业犹如达摩克里斯剑, 随时都在威胁着工人.

list.abs: 实用英语 - 影子人生的日志 -... ... a baker's dozen 额外优等 sword of damocles 临头的危险 by book or by crook 不择手段.

entry.tran: 达摩克利斯之剑;随时可能发生的危险
entry.def: If you say that someone has the Sword of Damocles hanging over their head, you mean that they are in a situation in which something very bad could happen to them at any time.

example.ex: As a Grand Prix driver, you have the Sword of Damocles hanging over your head at every moment.
example.tran: 作为国际汽车大奖赛的车手，随时都有可能发生事故。

means.word_mean: 1. the Greek courtier to Dionysius the Elder who (according to legend) was condemned to sit under a naked sword that was suspended by a hair in order to demonstrate to him that being a king was not the happy state Damocles had said it was (4th century BC)

auth_sentence.content: Damocles would not have been so lonely had he lived in Morgan City.
auth_sentence.res_content: Damocles would not have been so lonely had he lived in Morgan City.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Damocles would not have been so lonely had he lived in Morgan City.

auth_sentence.content: "We are facing the ultimate sword of Damocles," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "We are facing the ultimate sword of Damocles," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "We are facing the ultimate sword of Damocles," he said.

auth_sentence.content: But the overhang the sword of Damocles is the potential for contagion in Europe.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the overhang the sword of Damocles is the potential for contagion in Europe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the overhang the sword of Damocles is the potential for contagion in Europe.
